name: Dragon Ball Saiyans Never Die
description:
What if Frieza refused to destroy planet Vegeta? What would happend, if he ruled it with an iron fist and tyranny? 

Well in this game is what happens.  Frieza refused Beeruse's order, because he saw potential in the saiyans, that no soldier of his army had. The story continues as usually, Brolly gets send to planet Vampa, then Bardock sends his son Kakarot to planet earth, for his safety, and also Bardock still has his future sight and knows that one day Frieza will destroy  planet Vegeta.

Bardock is the only one who knows that the end of Frieza's tyranny will come from his son's hand, he has made sure that everything goes as he plans. Meanwhile,  Kakarot grows up on planet earth where he gets his name Goku from grandpa Gohan, there the history goes normal until some trouble show up on the planet but not from Radditz but from someone else...

The game is a fan made from a DBZ fan, and it is based from the old game of Legacy of Goku 2. Most of the stuff you see in the game (like the spritesheet or tilesets) were not made from me, I am just the guy who putted things up together to form this game so I don't get all the credit. 

Also a special thanks to the game testers who are doing a great job helping me on fixing buggs and other issues.
